about: ቁርአንን ማንበብ/መቅራት አልችልም ይሉ የነበሩ ብዙዎችን ከሁለት ወር ባነሰ ጊዜ ሙሉ ቁርዓን ጋር ያስተዋወቀ የእውቀት ማዕከል
A knowledge center that introduced many who said they could not read/recite the Quran to the entire Quran in less than two months
Giddu-gala beekumsa namoota baay'ee Qur'aana dubbisuu/qara'uu hin danda'an jedhan ji'a lamaa gaditti Qur'aana guutuu waliin wal barsiise
በየትኛውም የአለማችን ክፍል ላይ ሆነው በዘመናዊ ቴክኖሎጂ መተግበሪያችን ቁርአንን በጥራት ተምረው ና አጠናቀው ተፈትነው ማረጋገጫ ሰርተፍኬት ባለቤት የሚሆኑበት
Learn the Quran with quality, complete it, and receive a certificate of completion from anywhere in the world using our modern technology application.
Teeknooloojii ammayyaa fayyadamuun iddoo kamirrayyuu Qur'aana qulqullinaan baradhu, xumuri, ragaa xumuruu argadhu
ቁርአንን አሳምሮ የመቅራት ተጅዊድ ትምህርት የሚያገኙበት
Where you can learn Tajweed to recite the Quran beautifully
Qur'aana bareedinaan qara'achuuf Taajwiida barachuu dandeessu iddoo
ቁርአንን ለጨረሱ ኪታቦች የሚቀሩበት በሀፊዞችና በ በተመረጡ ኡስታዞች በተሞላው ተቋማችን የአላህን ቃል እንድማሩ ጋብዘነዎታል
We have extended an invitation to learn the word of Allah in our institution, which is filled with Hafizs and scholars, where the Quran is reserved for those who have completed the books.
Haafizootaa fi ustazoota filatamoo guutame keessatti, warra kitaabota xumuraniif Qur'aanni eeggamu; jecha Rabbii barachuuf isin affeerre
service: ኦንላይን ቁርዓን የማቅራት አግልግሎት በመረጡት ሰዓት
Online Quran recitation service at a time of your choice
Tajaajila Qur'aana qara'uu online irratti yeroo ati filatte
The work of reciting the Quran with Tajweed
በተለያዬ የዕድሜ ክልል ላይ ላሉ ተማሪዎች በተመቻቸ ሰአት፣ በተመረጡ ኡስታዦች እና በመረጡት ቦታ ማስቀራት
Providing classes for students of all ages at convenient times, with selected teachers, and at a location of their choice.
Barattoota umurii hundaaf yeroo mijataa, ustazoota filatamoo fi iddoo isaan filatanitti barnoota kennuu
ቁርዓን ተምረው ሲጨርሱ ኪታቦችን የማቅራት አግልግሎት
Teaching books after learning the Quran
ቁርዓን ተፍሲር የማቅራት አግልግሎት በዓሊሞች እና በሀፊዞች እየተሰጠ ይገኛል
Quran Tafsir teaching services are being provided by scholars and Hafizs.
Tajaajilli barsiisuu Tafsiira Qur'aanaa ulamaa'ota fi haafizootaan ni kennama
howTo: የኛን ሬጅስትራር በዋትስአፕ፣ ቴሌግራም ወይም ፌስቡክ በማነጋገር ይመዝገቡ
Register by contacting our registrar via WhatsApp, Telegram, or Facebook
WhatsApp, Telegraamii yookaan Faayisbukiin galmeessaa keenya quunnamuun galmaa'i
በመረጡት መርሃ ግብር ከተመደቡት አስተማሪ ጋር መማር ይጀምሩ
Start learning with your assigned teacher at your preferred schedule
Yeroo ati filatteen ustazaa siif ramadame waliin baruu jalqabi
ምዝገባዎን ለማረጋገጥ ክፍያዎን ደህንነቱ የተጠበቀ ያድርጉት እና ትምህርቶችዎን ይቀጥሉ
Make your payment securely to confirm your enrollment and continue your lessons
Galmeessa kee mirkaneessuuf kaffaltii nageenyaan godhi, barnoota kee itti fufi
